Name: Gonio VR
About the game: Gonio VR - a physiotherapeutical tool for shoulder injuries Screening Extremely precise shoulder movement and 'arc of pain' screening with HTC VIVE tracking. Rehabilitation exercises Exciting gamified VR exercises instruct and motivate patients through different shoulder exercises. Documentation Save and monitor the progress of each individual patient. Make sure patients receive the most optimal treatment. Developed with experts Designed and tested in cooporation with physiotherapists at multiple physiotherapy clinics in Denmark.
